Package gameClient

Class Arena

java.lang.Object
gameClient.Arena
public class Arena
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a multi Agents Arena which move on a graph - grabs Pokemons and avoid the Zombies.

    • updateEdge

      public static void updateEdge​(CL_Pokemon fr, directed_weighted_graph g)
      this method get pokemon and graph .run over all the edges that start from this nodes if this pokemon we get in the method show on this edge. if so the method set the pokemon on the edge, else non.
      Parameters:
      fr -
      g -

    • isOnEdge

      private static boolean isOnEdge​(geo_location p, geo_location src, geo_location dest)
      this method check if the distance from the src node to the dest (the edge we check if the pokemon show on),is equal to the distance from the src node to the pokemon+the distance from the pokemon to the dest.if so return true .else return false .
      Parameters:
      p -
      src -
      dest -
      Returns:

    • isOnEdge

      private static boolean isOnEdge​(geo_location p, int s, int d, directed_weighted_graph g)
      this method get geo_location p, int s, int d, directed_weighted_graph g ,and call this method isOnEdge(p,src,dest).
      Parameters:

      s -

      g -
      Returns:

    • isOnEdge

      private static boolean isOnEdge​(geo_location p, edge_data e, int type, directed_weighted_graph g)
      this method get edge,pokemon's geo_location,type and graph. The method check if the type we get corresponding to the src and dest.if the dest is bigger from the src so the type need to be positive else the pokemon can n't show on this edge ,and if the src is bigger than the dest the type need to be negative that the pokemon possibly to be on this edge.
      Parameters:
      p -
      e -
      type -
      g -
      Returns:
